website_summaries.verdict: This natural facial oil is made of quality ingredients and is suitable for treating dry, dull skin.
pros: Made with ingredients that are certified organic and include a blend of eight oils from seeds and fruits
Doesn't contain unnatural additives or fragrances
cons: Consistency is on the thick side which may not appeal to everyone
Some reports of breakouts after using it

customer_reviews.title: I’m officially a convert
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. I’m getting ready to buy my 3rd bottle. I travelled to Taiwan recently. I only used this and a lipstick (no makeup or anything else). The airplane was so drying. All I did was apply this on my face whenever I feel dry. My face looked so plump and moisturized when I arrived. Any how, I hope they don’t change anything.
customer_reviews.author: Bejeweled

customer_reviews.title: Open with caution!!
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited to try this and compare it to my drunk elephant oils. However, The packaging was tricky. When I opened the box, and began to pull out what was an insert that contained the oil, it fell out the side of it and smashed on my floor.
customer_reviews.author: careymia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Dry Skin!
customer_reviews.text: This product is full of healthy ingredients that nourish the skin in a luxurious oil. The oil at first seems greasy, but just wait a little and it will sink deep into the skin after just a few minutes, and will leave your face feeling soft and supple. My skin is very dry, especially in winter, so I really appreciate this product. It comes from a great company I can trust as well.
customer_reviews.author: KatieScarlettTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good but thick
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several facial oils. I find this one very good as it moisturizes my face deeply, however I find it a bit too greasy and thick. I don't like to apply it as my daily or nightly moisturizer, I mostly use it in small proportion and its fine.
customer_reviews.author: Marjohny

customer_reviews.title: Great, easily absorbed moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after receiving a sample in a beauty box. I waited until it was on lightning deal. It is such a wonderful moisturizer. It seems really heavy when first applied, but within a moment or two, it is light and has absorbed into my skin nicely, not leaving behind any heavy feeling film or residue. It really doesnt have much of a scent and has caused no reactions whatsoever in my EXTREMELY sensitive skin. Love it. Loved the deal I got. Will continue to use this oil for the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this moisturizing oil!!! I have super dry skin and I use this every night and morning to help keep my skin hydrated during these dry winter months! I use with the Honest lotion both have a nice light feel.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: It is authentic?
customer_reviews.text: So I just received this item today . But I’m curious if this Honest beauty organic facial oil Is an authentic one or fake ?? Every other picture I see online , the bottle looks different like a cloudy type glass . Mine happen to look super clear and see through . I will post a picture to show exactly what I mean .
customer_reviews.author: Stef M.

customer_reviews.title: The best ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! Love! My absolute favorite beauty oil. It has made such a difference. Everyone always asks me why my skin looks so good and why it’s flowing at 42... well this is it! I use it every day morning and night after my moisturizer. Rub a few drops in my hands and pat on face and neck. I swear by it.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiMarie

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out
customer_reviews.text: I (26yo F) figured I'd try this as an alternative to the one i usually buy (RITUALS Glow face oil) because the store I physically go to is closed due of C19. I have really sensitive, acne-prone skin and this made me break out within a day. It's a lot thinner in consistency and shinier than the one I usually use. It may work for other people, but this purchase was a letdown for me, especially because my regular face oil is only like $7 more expensive but much better in quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mishi Sho

customer_reviews.title: Good facial oil
customer_reviews.text: I really like Honest Beauty products, and the facial oil is no exception. Though my favorite is an orchid oil by Clarins, this one is much less expensive. I mix it with my moisturizer in the mornings, and it really works on my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil! My face always feels clean and moisturized when I use this oil. I was scared it would clog my pores and make my skin feel dirty and oily but nope! It is a great product that I will likely buy again. I do wish it was cheaper especially for its size but hey, there are smaller facial oils that go for more money so I’m not complaining.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Timms

customer_reviews.title: Works like any face oil, smells nice
customer_reviews.text: This smells refreshing and nice, I use 2 drops every morning before makeup and 2 drops mixed with rose hip oil at night and I feel it works well - just as nice as any other oil I've used. I probably won't buy again as it's a tad more expensive and you could use a mix of a couple oils (olive, avocado, rose hip, tamarau, etc) and a couple drops of essential oil for a cheaper price. Love face oils and this is just as good as any others!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Itchy rash & breakout
customer_reviews.text: Have combo skin, rare breakouts - usually stress related, if anything. Started using this at night only and it immediately broke me out in an itchy rash. Also clogged my pores. It does smell nice & ingredients seem good but not at the expense of having worse skin than when I started. Disappointed as I use a lot of Honest products (bath).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing oil!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. I've been using it for about 3 weeks now and I use it once in the morning and once at night. It is a little oily so if you're going to be putting on makeup, I would recommend using it at least an hour before you apply your makeup. It smells amazing and my skin is so soft and supple. I also love that it's vegan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: it's so good that when I was sick and kept blowing my nose it was red and irritated all around. After applying a little bit of this oil around my nose Kleenex area in a short time (less than 30 mins) the redness went away. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I just love this oil. It can be used on the face for very dry skin. I mix it with my moisturizer too and apply to my face. It is good for cuticles as well.
customer_reviews.author: gcstorey

customer_reviews.title: Gave up on this product...
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for a month straight and was happy enough with how it made my skin feel but I did not notice any improvements over the long term. Like others have said, it had an odd smell, felt very oily and thick but did not really seep into my skin. But the real reason I had to give up is because while using this product, I was frequently getting a burning sensation in my eye, where my eye would tear up uncontrollably. I have since stopped using this product (over the last two weeks) and have not had any more issues.
customer_reviews.author: TPan

customer_reviews.title: Smells Delicious, Nice Consistency
customer_reviews.text: I love this facial oil and use it on my face and decolletage after cleansing and using a mask. It smells delicious and absorbs well on my chest but not so much on the face, so I apply it in the early evening so it doesn't wind up all over my pillows.
customer_reviews.author: PeaceBang

customer_reviews.title: Super nice and smoothing
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and didn’t break me out! I have dry skin and this really helps! Works great under makeup if you add a drop or two into your daily moisturizer and let it sit for a minute and apply the foundation and it goes on super smooth and doesn’t get oily through out the day (dry dry skin)
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Love - great face oil
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product. I honestly (no pun intended) don’t remember how I came across this on amazon and didn’t realize it was Jessica Alba’s company BUT I have nothing but positive things to say about it. It definitely adds moisture to my skin (which is what I wanted) with natural ingredients. My skins mostly dry and this really as made a difference for less than $30. I use it at night only on top of my retinol but would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: jasmine d.

customer_reviews.title: In LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I went through a little bit of breakouts at first, but after my skin got used to the product and I cut back the amount of drops I was using, my skin looks and feels amazing! It smells amazing and absorbs into the skin quickly, unlike other oils I’ve used in the past when my skin looks shinny all day long. I will absolutely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for extra dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few beauty oils recently. I have very dry skin from acutane treatments. This stuff worked great and didn’t irritate my skin!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Allen

customer_reviews.title: The product is okay I was hoping it was great
customer_reviews.text: Felt good on my face but didn't improve my texture the way I thought it would
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Becerra

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Was excited about its healthy ingredients but the smell and the greasiness were offensive. The other issue is that it doesn't work nor make my super dry face feel moisturized. I prefer Kiehl's midnight recovery concentrate & use it every night.
customer_reviews.author: D. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Got it on sale. Really like it, use it multiple times a day. I don't know of I'd buy it full price though. It says two drops per use so it should last a while though I probably use double that
customer_reviews.author: saba

customer_reviews.title: Total hydration
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! It looks so natural just how I like it.. 🤩 my boyfriend couldn’t stop telling me baby you look so beautiful today 😌
customer_reviews.author: Zoraya Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Better than the $90 face oils
customer_reviews.text: I was spending $80 on the Drunk Elephant Marula oil, $88 on the Herbivore oil and this Honest Beauty oil is replacing both for me. This oil absorbs into my skin much nicer, leaving my skin feeling soft and nourished. Amazing value!!!
customer_reviews.author: CLA

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this product. I have sensitive skin and this product doesn't irritate my face. 2 drops covers my face and neck. Bottle will last a really long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Honest Beauty
customer_reviews.text: This face oil comes in a beautiful glass bottle with a dropper head. It is easy to use/ apply. You only need 1to2 drops when applying, so this is a great value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: Honestly
customer_reviews.text: First off, love the package! It's simple and yet elegant. The oil itself gets very warm as you rub off between the palm of the hands to apply. It is not heavy on the skin and it has a pleasant scent. I've gotten compliments as my facial looking younger. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: JlovesU

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail of Beauty Oil
customer_reviews.text: I order this again and again bc it is simply the best. I love applying it before bedtime, my skin glows in the morning and this has helped so much with my overall complexion. Very light, soothing, and pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Moore

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: My skin felt so smooth and supple after just the first use. Smells good too! I'm 40 and my skin is becoming more dry and this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: I wasn't Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I did not like it and retuned it i wanted to like it because I love her line but honestly for the price I was very disappointed. you can just buy rose hip oil and call it a day. Felt too greasy didn't have great absorption.
customer_reviews.author: Zelia Milan

customer_reviews.title: Great value, doesn’t cause brake outs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I wanted it for! Makes my skin so smooth and seals all my skin care in at night or when I feel like I just need some extra moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing oil based moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with this oil! I love it! Goes on and dries within minutes. Only a few days of use and my skin is glowing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It only takes a drop
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to beauty oil It only take a drop for your face and neck area and makes the skin feel soft and hydrated.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie Leverett

customer_reviews.title: Great !!!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on when I am about to pluck or shave my facial hair.. it seem to make the hair stand up omg makes everything so easy and fast
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Made me break out, way better facial oils out there that give you a nice glow. This just felt like a typical heavy oil.
customer_reviews.author: Sagey

customer_reviews.title: I’m a fan!
customer_reviews.text: This has become a staple in my beauty routine. Super happy with this! Would recommend. I have sensitive skin & had nothing but good results using this!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Doughty

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: Love how it leaves my skin feeling so fresh and I use it in both morning and evenings!
customer_reviews.author: Savanna Edgerton

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I am really loving this facial oil! I use it at night after I apply my moisturizer. I am a nurse and wearing PPE for 12-13 hrs per day so my skin has needed some TLC. This has helped add some moisture back! I love the scent as well. Just be careful when you open the box bc I broke my first bottle when I unknowingly opened it upside down and the bottle fell on the floor and shattered.
customer_reviews.author: Kailee Allen

customer_reviews.title: Honestly Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, hydrating, and smells delicious! Keeps skin glowing all day - not oily!
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a nice glow
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different face oils and this one is quickly becoming my favorite. It leaves a nice glow and not the oily feeling that some others have left. The scent is mild but nice. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Beauty Oil
customer_reviews.text: Great beauty oil. I use this morning and night after cleansing and moisturizing. Lays well under makeup without feeling heavy or making skin too greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney Wadkins Campisi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price! Smells great and makes your skin feel soft.
customer_reviews.author: eClaire

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I have really dry skin, and need oil to keep a healthy balance. Most oils I used in the past usually cause acne but this one is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Kennon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome oil
customer_reviews.text: I have dry skin and this product worked amazingly. I love it! Made my face as soft as a babies bottom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I have ultra dry, sensitive skin. This oil has been a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Warren

customer_reviews.title: Better than any purchased at Sephora
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a lot of facial oils at varying prices, mostly high - and this one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Cober

customer_reviews.title: Smells divine
customer_reviews.text: I just love this face oil. It's soothing, smells amazing, and does its job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: KimmieD

customer_reviews.title: Honest goodness and awesome moisture with a wonderful price.
customer_reviews.text: Love the down to earth honest pricing and ingredients. It reminds me of my more expensive oil I used to get from Avedda.
customer_reviews.author: DAS

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Super light and smells so nice. I have sensitive skin & this feels great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice oil don’t expect a result
customer_reviews.text: I’m use the product every night It’s feels good but I don’t see any difference
customer_reviews.author: Ilan

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love using all the honest co products! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It gives you a nice glow and its lightweight on the skin
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, the best facial oil I have found by far
customer_reviews.author: B Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good product, wasteful packaging
customer_reviews.text: Trying to take my skincare routine more seriously as I enter my 30s and so added this face oil daily. I do like the product but will be looking for one with less wasteful packaging next time around!
customer_reviews.author: mmogden

customer_reviews.title: Great oil
customer_reviews.text: It's a great face oil for the price point and amazing ingredients still...I love their products..
customer_reviews.author: Neneallen

customer_reviews.title: Oh lala
customer_reviews.text: I love wearing this alone or under my face moisturizer
customer_reviews.author: Gia

customer_reviews.title: So worth it if you have dry flakey skin
customer_reviews.text: This has changed my skin! I’m always super dry in the winter and get patches that peel.. this has completely stopped that!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: So hydrating
customer_reviews.text: Im loving this product so much! I think i'll be stocking up. It works very well on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: hajii

customer_reviews.title: Glad to have found this!
customer_reviews.text: I use this everyday. My skin feels hydrated and smoother. It smells nice, not too overpowering. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene G.

customer_reviews.title: Winter days covered
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, my face has been well hydrated this winter thanks Honest !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good smell
customer_reviews.text: The scent is very good. I wear this instead of perfume.
customer_reviews.author: Clico

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I so love this product! No scent at all. Works well on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ofie Booth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This oil works like magic! My skin is so hydrated without feeling greasy
customer_reviews.author: Haley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: I love this face oil. It smells perfect and doesn’t give me acne, I swear it actually make my acne better. And my face feels smoother than ever.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally oily/hydrated and sensitive skin - I have not had break outs in years (20+) until using this for a week. I purchased cleaner, moisturizer, serum, and oil. So weird. I bought a starter kit for my son too, and same thing happened with his skin. The breakouts look like mosquito bites! No good.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Feels and smells great, but not a long term fix
customer_reviews.text: My skin is very dry and flaky. This facial oil definitely helps day-to-day, my skin feels very soft and looks moisturized. It's not too thick, but I would recommend using very generously if you have oily skin. The smell is also great! I've been using this product for 2 weeks, and it doesn't appear to be a long term fix. My skin is great for the day, but it goes back to being dry the next morning. However, I still love it and makes my skin look nice and glow-y.
customer_reviews.author: Morgaine Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect combo
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product with the retanol and vitamin c products and I love them. I have severe skin allergies and none of these products make me break out or have symptoms. This oil smells so wonderful. You warm up a few drops in your hands then apply gently it automatically hydrates your skin without making you look greasy. Highly recommend all honest products.
customer_reviews.author: Emmilee Ringelberg

customer_reviews.title: Not too oily
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic as a facial moisturizer. It isn't too oily. My skin drinks it up and just feels soft and supple. I like knowing there aren't a lot of artificial ingredients or preservatives in it. I will be sticking with this product.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointing don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with this product. I was expecting a moisturizer that will bring freshness, glow and relieve to my skin. What I got was a lot of redness, drying and cracks to my face. Even i didn't pay much, the point is to take the best advantage to your money. This was a waste in so many levels that I can't even start to explain.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Honestly, this stuff is pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It smells great, it's USDA certified organic, makes my skin feel moisturized (but not greasy or pore clogging), and the price makes it a good value. I have been using it for several weeks now and will reorder. I've tried other brands Eminence, Kora, Sunday Riley,...and NONE of those, in my opinion is better. In fact, they're just more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Den

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I’ve purchased three bottles already! It’s very hydrating and makes my face have such a glow! Have had multiple comments from friends/family about improvement in skin quality and it’s from this product ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Kami Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful addition to your skincare routine
customer_reviews.text: Its smooth and not scented. Only need 1-3 drops per use. It mixes really well with moisturizer. If you have normal skin, you can use it alone or even as primer! I have acne and its helping me heal my skin much quicker than before.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany L

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: I tend to have dry skin and bedd an oil I feel too wear under my moisturizer. I like how lightweight the oil is and how it has a very clean smell, and feels refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful facial oil!
customer_reviews.text: Love this facial oil! I have very sensitive skin it doesn’t irritate my skin. Great moisturizer without ever being too oily and has a light floral scent. I use it day and night and it has replaced my formerly much more expensive creams.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Please don’t ever discontinue this item it’s great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to see if it would be comparable to the eminence facial recovery oil and I am very satisfied and the price is way way better I love this oil and use it every day I mix it with a little bit of water to thin it out in the palm of my hand but it’s also great full strength. Please don’t discontinue this item it’s a main stay for me
customer_reviews.author: tealover

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing! I have dry skin and use it am/pm, it has not made me breakout and I notice a difference in fine lines when I put on make up. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: A spa in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: This smells so good and it is perfect for my skin. I’m normal/dry with skin sensitivity. This came in my subscribe and save and it is my new favorite facial oil. It smells like a spa in a bottle and it makes my skin glow. I love it
customer_reviews.author: ShawnOne

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but works! I have rosacea and it really keeps my skin hydrated. I use it daily so i guess you can say you get your money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: Pbtj

customer_reviews.title: Love this oil
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this oil. I believe it helps my moisturizer absorb more deeply. It is great for sun kissed cheeks too
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Flawless skin!
customer_reviews.text: It makes my skin so soft and helps keep it flawless. I have dry/oily skin and it’s great for me. I’ve also had a friend with oily skin try it and she loved it too. The oil drys quick so you’re not left with a greasy face
customer_reviews.author: Justina

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love using this oil a little goes a long way. Smells pleasant and gives me a nice glow.
customer_reviews.author: Kat G

customer_reviews.title: Purchased multiple times and LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to try an oil, but this is a game changer with regard to moisture without leaving a greasy oily feeling! It does not cause breakouts and instead had remediated them for myself! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: How have I been missing out on beauty oil for this long? I love the way it makes my skin feel and it doesn't cause breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, I just dont use everyday.
customer_reviews.text: Love it but I cant use it everyday.. it tends to clog my pores.. however, the days I use it my skin glows without being oily. I will always have it in my pantry.
customer_reviews.author: India

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love using this oil its great on my skin. I put it on my lips and nails as well, it very lightweight but yet hydrating
customer_reviews.author: Jrodrigues15

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing and I absolute love it makes my feel skin. Great under makeup in winter when I get dry skin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this serum! It does not leave your face feeling oily or greasy, great scent and leaves it glowing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value, but not for me
customer_reviews.text: This is probably a great oil, but it has too many essential oils in it for my skin. The price is great, but it leaves my skin slightly agitated rather than being calming or healing.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

product_meta.title: Honest Beauty Organic Beauty Facial Oil with a Blend of 8 Fruit & Seed Oils | USDA-Certified Organic | Paraben Free, Dermatologist Tested, Cruelty Free | 1.0 fl. oz
product_meta.description: When it comes to replenishing moisture-depleted skin, This lightweight Honest Beauty Facial oil is a total natural. Usda-certified organic ingredients in every drop deliver radiant results for smoother, more luminous skin. A blend of pure seed and fruit oils like avocado and Apricot kernel help nourish skin and restore vital moisture while rose, ylang ylang and clove oils lend the silky formula Its subtle, natural scent.
feature_bullets: Replenishes moisture-depleted skin for a supple feel
Enriched with pure seed and fruit oils like nourishing avocado and Apricot kernel. Leaves skin smoother and more radiant
Naturally scented with a botanical blend of rose, ylang ylang and clove oils
MADE WITHOUT: Parabens, Silicones, Paraffins, Dyes, Synthetic Fragrances

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
